resource.description: A resouce representing association of an individual with a customer account.

attribute.name: relationship
attribute.comment: Describes the relationship between the customer-account and the person.

attribute.name: accepted
attribute.comment: Indicates whether the contact has accepted the terms and conditions for the customer-account.

attribute.name: trader
attribute.comment: Indicates whether the contact is allowed to place orders on behalf of the customer-account.

relationship.name: customer-account
relationship.comment: The customer account that this resource relates to.

relationship.name: person
relationship.comment: The individual that this resource relates to.

url.comment: Returns collection of all contacts for a customer account.
